page.title: 13Distributing Companies
page.content: {Oregon}sells chain saws from U.S.A. They employ 23 people, 8 of whom are females{.F.T.Scientific Instruments resell goods from Switzerland,Germany and Holland to Hospitals,ICI,Large Laboratories and Universities.11 people are employed,4 females {.Bredon {Tele Centre}resell T.V.s and Videos to the public.They employ three people. {Woolards}buy tools from Gloucester and package them for factories.They employ a female and a male{.Lyons Bakery distribute cakes baked in Carlton, Yorkshire,their head office,to shops and supermarkets.They employ 11 men {.Graingers Dairy}buy the milk from Cotteswold Dairy,Tewkesbury and sell it locally.On average they distribute 4,000 bottles a day.They employ 14 people,and sell other dairy products and soft drinks.
